title: Operations
description: This chapter introduces the notion of Operations on Tezos. These are more commonly known as Transactions on other blockchains and in Tezos are a subset of operations. On Tezos, transactions are transfers of tokens and smart contracts calls. A few examples of operations that are not transactions on Tezos: Originations; endorsements; proposals; ballots...

frontMatter.title: Operations
frontMatter.authors: Thomas Zoughebi, Aymeric Bethencourt, and Maxime Fernandez
